DOC.brief_summary: This study conduct healthy volunteer investigate effect single dose GSK561679 change brain activation , compare active comparator , lorazepam .
DOC.brief_title: A Study To Investigate Effects Of GSK561679 On Brain Activation During Emotional Processing In Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy male Nonsmokers Body weight 50 kg ( 110 lb ) high , BMI within range 1929.9 kg/m2 Normal ECG . Any serious medical disorder condition . Any history endocrine disorder . Any clinically significant laboratory abnormality . History psychiatric illness . Any history suicidal attempt behavior . History current diagnosis acute narrow angle glaucoma . Left hand
